website_summaries.verdict: A good-sized rug that offers a lot to play with, although some parents felt it didn't live up to its promise in terms of quality.
pros: Several different scenes available, including this 37 by 79 inches train setting
Has places to park trains, cars, and boats
cons: Some complaints that this rug arrived looking different from the product image (distorted, dull, or different colors)
The rug snags easily on things such as little car wheels

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It's fantastic!! I have no complaints! It rolled out smoothly and it's not super soft but soft enough for my son to play on just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amber B

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it - no rubber backing - beware!
customer_reviews.text: Its very cute, bright and the kids loved it... i'm rating with 3 stars as there was NO rubber backing, and for a carpet for kids, I think this is a MUST - and for the price, it certainly could have some kind of anti-slip on the back. First step when the boys got home, and they slipped as the carpet moved right out from under it. With the edging raised, it is hard to put another no slip mat underneath, and for now i've had to put it under the legs of the bed - not exactly what I was planning for!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Great little "getaway"
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for this carpet. The colors are bright and vivid, it was much nicer than anticipated. My kiddos hae spent hours playing on this, the backing in good quality and hasn't crumbled like some other carpets do when they break down from lots of use. 4 kiddos have played comfortably on this for an extended period of time, each with enough of their space to make play fun :)
customer_reviews.author: duffer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: For starters the mat in the picture is deceiving. The carpet is not that shape in fact it's long and skinny (read the dementions but the picture made it seem different.) . The carpet started falling apart shortly after we got it for our son for Christmas. It slides all over the place and is just made poorly. Wouldn't recommend this product for this price at all. Dont waste ur money u have Wood floors and can put something under it to help with the sliding.
customer_reviews.author: 2020Momof3

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. I looked around and decided on this one cuz it has train tracks and car tracks. Got it yesterday. My son loves it! He's all the time playing in the floor with his cars. It's rolled out nicely and stays put to his hardwood floor. Much bigger than I expected. I knew it would be longer than wider but it was much wider than I expected. I had to remove his old rug instead of using both in his room cuz it wouldn't fit together. So far I am very pleased with this rug!
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Smith

customer_reviews.title: So I finally looked online and this one seemed like the best deal and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get one of these road rugs for my son's room and couldn't find one in ANY store-not even walmart! So I finally looked online and this one seemed like the best deal and I love it! It's got a cute scene, with several construction areas and lots of road to drive. It's nice and big, it's flat, with tight weaving, so cars drive easily on it, even the small ones, and it wasn't stuck in a curve from being curled up, which is something that I worried about ordering online. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Mats Don't Line Up Together
customer_reviews.text: We bought 6 of these for our playroom floor thinking they'd all be identical (poor assumption on our part). Obviously these are cut from massive fabric so they aren't all identical. In some, the airplane is at the top and others it is at the bottom or middle. We did our best to line them up together to make it looks like they transition into one another but 1 of the 6 is so drastically different that it doesn't really fit in. Otherwise a very good quality mat/rug for our playroom floor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for hotwheel lovers
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old Grandson LOVES this. He is a car fanatic. He will line up all his hot wheel cars which the parking spaces fit really well and the road will accommodate almost 2 cars perfectly. It is the perfect mat for a young child to play on, it is like industrial carpet but not as rough as you would think. Well made and the rubber back makes it non-slip and easy to wet down and clean out side for spills. This item saved our carpet more then a few times and brought much joy to our grandson
customer_reviews.author: anthony2823Top Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids who are into trains
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a play rug for my 3 year old son and after looking at several of them, ultimately, I chose this one because of his love of trains. He immediately started playing on it with his collection of Thomas trains and die cast cars. The rug is not thick but it's backing has a good grip on the floor and the edges are well made. Well worth the $30 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Lee

customer_reviews.title: This rug absorbs my sons attention.
customer_reviews.text: So far, we love this rug for my 2 year old. He's racing his cars around it making car sounds, which buys me a few minutes to get ready in the morning. We haven't had any issues with smell as some reviews mentioned. Also, we haven't tried to wash it, so I'm not sure about the color running, but great fun mat for kids to buy Mom a few precious alone moments. Ohe, I did notice that the ends don't match up in tthe design real well, but that's a bit picky and my toddler sure won't care; that's just my scrutiny.
customer_reviews.author: J. Daley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this rug, he plays on it often with his cars and even his dinosaurs. I love seeing him play on it and watching all his cars lined up. His imagination really sparks up. The rug is holding up really well, had it for about 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For playroom or nursery...
customer_reviews.text: Great little carpet for playtime when baby or toddler is crawling and cruising, this substantially sized mat is colorful and well designed graphically. Down the road, the neighborhood becomes real as little cars and trucks travel through. Carpet did not slip or slide when in place. Noticed 'designs may vary' in description and called Amazon. I was assured that if design was not to my liking, it could be returned, postage free. My design differed from that displayed on the website. but subtlely so. The buildings were not in the same place but there, and the road markings were slightly different. No problem, it had it all that was pictured. Happily kept it and little one is enjoying! .
customer_reviews.author: An Educated Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Super cool.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool play rug. It's pretty thin, which is fine on top of carpet, and seems to be great quality. The images on it are really fun and unique, which is why I chose this rug in particular. It's nice and big and looks great in our playroom. Our daughter is having a great time driving her cars and trucks around on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dracollo

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet! Has place for trains
customer_reviews.text: Great carpet! Has place for trains, cars, and boats. Grandson (4-5) took to it immediately and plays for hours. Well made, colorful and doesn't wrinkle when moving cars etc over it. Bought "Learning Carpets Giant Road LC 124" (which I also recommend) for use at cabin as he had a train table at home. He wanted it at home and cabin so for Christmas I bought this carpet. Now he loves playing with both in L design. Don't know if only one will ever make it to the cabin. Be careful when looking for at other play carpets because some have repeat scenes instead of large open scene.
customer_reviews.author: LaRee

customer_reviews.title: Two feral kids haven't destroyed it yet!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The rug is thin, but not so thin that it would fit in a washing machine. I would not recommend washing this rug at all as the rubber backing would peel right off. the rubber doesn't seem to keep it down so well on carpet but I also have two feral boy toddlers who would do anything in their power to destroy their new presents. It has held up great so far to their destructive ways. They colors are vibrant and the lines are correctly placed. I received exactly what I ordered and didn't smell any weird smells like some commented about. It has turned out to be a great purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Be wary of loose strings that ruin the rug and possible carpet burn on children.
customer_reviews.text: Very easily torn because of all the loose threads that were on it that were quickly pulled out by my nephew. There are tons of missing pieces to the run now, just because of how fragile it is, so I only recommend taking it out for special occasions instead of leaving it out. Also be wary of carpet burn, especially if your child is a rough player, as the fabric is very short and not soft at all. Despite that though, the rug is as described and great for play time and imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Drive By Baptisms

customer_reviews.title: Great imaginative tool
customer_reviews.text: Love the rug for my little guy, but it easily bunches up (even on a flat surface). He gets annoyed by it with his OCD personality, but still loves it. There are parking spaces he loves to park his cars in and pretends the buildings are different places we have been. He also takes his lego sets and places them on top of the buildings and uses the streets and parking spots around them. Easy to move around the house, if we need to move to another area.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Good size, a little too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Great play carpet. My kid loves it. However there are artificial glares on the windows and it just looks like bleach spills. The play mat could probably do without those. Its a great size and great design. I love all of the different places. I feel like it has everything you can think of. Hospital, police station, fire station, airport, offices. It was kind of expensive, but overall it was a good product
customer_reviews.author: Pizza face

customer_reviews.title: such a great play mat!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great rug i love all the details and how long it is and its held up really well with a lot of play. Only thing that stinks is it needs a hard surface to lay on. We moved this into a room with a rug and it just wont lay flat. No big deal its a rug and meant to be on a hard surface its also non slip and that a great feature too.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona25

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year old loves his car mat. It is a durable quality. The surface is a carpet-like material with a rubber non-skid bottom. It is comfortable. It holds up well. It can roll it up and store it in the corner and unroll it on the floor and it stays nice and flat without wrinkles. The only thing to note is that the rug images are cut differently, so your version of the rug may be slightly different than the one you see in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2Ryan

customer_reviews.title: ... originally sent the wrong one by mistake-(Pink)- Seller was super fast to exchange for the correct one
customer_reviews.text: Was originally sent the wrong one by mistake-(Pink)- Seller was super fast to exchange for the correct one! My kids love this rug so much, hours of playtime with the little cars. I put it in our playroom for a girl and a boy both under the age of 6. The pink one was cute too but I wanted the city one since my son uses it too. Would recommend to anyone with small kids and toy cars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful carpet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful carpet and it was exactly what I was looking for it’s not cheap quality it’s a very good quality and we have it on the floor all the time so when she wants to play with the trains she can immediately there’s no need to roll it up because it’s nice and thick great quality
customer_reviews.author: Edie Billich

customer_reviews.title: BIG & HAS TRAIN TRACKS TOO!
customer_reviews.text: Two year old loves his cars and this mat is perfect! Some other mat designs I likes better but this is definitely designed with the kid in mind over matching my living room. He really interacts with it... using the tracks with his trains, pretends things fall in the water, uses the construction site for the tractor toys he has. Designed great, colors are bright, and material is great quality. Rolls up and back out without curling up. It looks like you could put two together and they would line up but I don't see why you would because it is the perfect size... long enough for two to play together. Love this mat! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MommaMel

customer_reviews.title: The Rug is cute and my kidos love it esecialy the fact they can mix trains and ...
customer_reviews.text: The Rug is cute and my kidos love it esecialy the fact they can mix trains and cars. The rug is not average rectangle shaped rug it is quite long horizontally which works well for us because two kids can sit side by side on it and play with lots of room just be prepared if your expecting the average shape rug for other cars. the images are not crisp but are good enough that you can play well. one of the corners of my rug will not lay flat due to the thinness of the rug and the shipping but its not a huge obstacle.
customer_reviews.author: momok

customer_reviews.title: Bigger is good as it covers more of my hardwood floors from ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this carpet. Picture shows what appears to be a square rug and so I guess I didn't pay much attention to the size measurements. The rug that arrived however is much bigger than I expected and very rectangular in shape. Bigger is good as it covers more of my hardwood floors from being scratched by trucks and cars but it's so long it really doesn't fit well in the space I had planned for it. Overall though lots of fun for little kids to drive vehicles all over.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Cute Rug!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rug and well worth the price. It is perfect next to my son’s bed - it doesn’t skid, and messes come out easily (so far!). We’ve had it for about 3 months and it is holding up great to regular wear and tear, including running his matchbox cars up and down the pictures roads in the city rug print. Love it! Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Tlcmama

customer_reviews.title: An awesome rug for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest rug! I shopped for quite a bit and I'm so glad I chose this one. It is a real rug not felt. It's about the length of a twin bed and width. My grandson loves it! His matchbox cars fit in one half of the Lane as it should be,after all what if they want to drive in separate directions! ;) Decorating the room so forgive the stuff all over in the photo! :0
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Stark

customer_reviews.title: Cant be beat for price
customer_reviews.text: After plenty of research we settled on this carpet for our nursery. We wanted a carpet that we could use for tummy time and also be useful for play time as our child grows. We really liked the price and free shipping through amazon prime. We have not been disappointed in our purchase. The colors are vibrant and quality is great for the price. The roads, tracks, buildings, and boats will be a blast to play on. The scale will be perfect for matchbox cars and tons of adventures. Its not the softest carpet, but for cars and such it will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Carpet falling apart 1.5 months in
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this carpet is awesome-huge and great roads! Our son loves it, but unfortunately with only a couple of weeks of use, the strings of the carpet started fraying and coming out, so the carpet is slowly, but surely, unraveling. We've had it for 1.5 months now and it's looking like it won't survive three. There's a reason this was so inexpensive...
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lake

customer_reviews.title: Well made play carpet.
customer_reviews.text: This was the second time that I bought this carpet as a gift. It's perfect for more than one child to share as it is long and has plenty of play area. The carpet is thick and has a skid proof backing, it's very well made and should hold up to tough car play. I'm thinking of buying it for a third time for another child as s gift. Buy some matchbox cars to go with it and it's the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: High quality rug.
customer_reviews.text: I have four very wild, very messy kids that LOVE to destroy rugs if they can. This rug however has stayed strong. The colors are vibrant and there has been no issues of fraying edges like many other rugs I have bought in the past, which is great because once one string hangs out the little one's will pull, pull, pull til there's no rug left. I am a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great potential, too bad they don’t care.
customer_reviews.text: a few months later it looks like old junk... :( I should have return it. It’s actually a very cool and good looking playground. The only problem is the quality, it’s a very low quality product. I wish they were making them better.
customer_reviews.author: LoLa

customer_reviews.title: Wrong order sent
customer_reviews.text: The rug is huge and gorgeous, but I was not sent the one I ordered. I ordered "Ride the Train" and got one of the city ones instead. It was too late to send back, as this was a gift, and my nephew will love either, but I know he'd have liked the other better. Just beware that you could get the wrong order.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Has a nice non-skid rubber backing and can easily be used outside ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made rug! Has a nice non-skid rubber backing and can easily be used outside and hosed off. The surface isn't so soft that little ones can't run their matchbox cars around on it. For the price this was the one to get and it has not let us down yet! One of the best parts is that it's not made in China, Belgium is its origin, sturdy European construction.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great big rug - my kid loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Great big rug - my kid loves it. I saw the same exact rug at my local DMV for the kids to play on so you know it will hold up to some abuse. It came rolled up but laid down flat when rolled out.
customer_reviews.author: nolan campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality rug for kids
customer_reviews.text: This was a great carpet until our English Setter totally destroyed it by chewing it up. Our toddler boy loved playing with his cars on this so we ended up buying him another one. The quality is great but the ends do tend to roll up.
customer_reviews.author: Lance A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: not the one i ordered
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this giant rug that had the pool on it for my granddaughter as that is the one she wanted. when she opened it for christmas is is NOT the one we had ordered. it is the city map. very disappointed that they did this. now when i look back at my order status they say the giant one is unavailable. that was not the case when i ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it! We bought the city map rug. They have had their cars and Lego people on it all day. Walking, and driving all over the town shopping and visiting people. When they go to bed, the dog and cat are sleeping on it. The entire family is using it. Very well made, no loose threads. VERY WELL MADE! No odd plastic or rug smells from it!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I bought this for my son for Christmas so he hasnt had a chance to play with it yet, but it looks like a blast! ----- Update: he plays with this on a daily basis. Good buy .
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: My son's new favorite thing in the house
customer_reviews.text: My son's new favorite thing in the house. Anytime visitors come over this is where he brings them to show off his "little city". A lot bigger than I had anticipated which was perfect. Ithe fits very nicely in his room
customer_reviews.author: Sheryce

customer_reviews.title: My kids and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's exactly what I was looking for. It's perfect for Matchbox and Hot Wheel sized cars. It's a great large size, vibrant colors and great quality. My kids love it and it's going to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Duffer

customer_reviews.title: Great detail and size.
customer_reviews.text: Lots to engage the imagination here. The material it tight, durable and easy to roll up and move. The size is better than the two smaller play rugs I bought. Also the detail on this is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great rug!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my son, and he loves it! This carpet has both railroad tracks and roads on it, so it's perfect for everyone who loves to drive! There is a bit of a hot wheels obsession in my house right now, and this rug is the perfect thing for it! I've been stepping on less tiny pieces of metal, as they've all been contained on the rug! Definitely recommend this product! It was actually longer than expected, though I read the dimensions before I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice quality. Colors are bright and picture is clear. Doesnt seems to slide around much while playing with it. Doesnt want to stay curled around the edges like other ones I've had. Son loves it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Schlarb

customer_reviews.title: Great rug!
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded my expectations. The rug is fantastic quality. When I got the box, I thought that when I unrolled it that I would have to weigh it down to flatten it out. That was not necessary. It immediately became flat. It has a rubber type non-slip backing. The colors are vibrant. The road size is perfect for Hot Wheels size cars.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and vibrant. My 5 year old uses it daily. I don't even roll up. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Venessa

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it and its good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good size play mat my kids love it and it is very good quality doesn't crease or fold even though it was folded when shipped it keeps its shape very well I've had one for a long time and it is still in good shape
customer_reviews.author: #1 Honest reviewer :)

customer_reviews.title: Nice Play Carpet!
customer_reviews.text: The carpet is nice. My 1 year old grandson likes it. I am sure any child who likes cars and vehicles will enjoy the rug. However the item shipped was not the rug ordered. I am disappointed he didn't receive City Life carpet I ordered. Gift was sent direct to my grandson who lives in a different state. I did not want to ask his mother to roll it up and return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane

customer_reviews.title: Nice carpet, a little too busy for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: The carpet is well constructed. It's thin, but has enough thickness that it cushions my toddler nephew when he falls. Excellent rubber backing prevents sliding. The colors are strong, but a bit dark. It's also very busy with the roads and houses, etc. - I think it's too busy to capture the attention of a toddler. I think he'll appreciate it more when he's a little older. It's priced too high to be a great value, but it's a good buy if it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: BetteTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful but...
customer_reviews.text: It's big and just what we were looking for. It has roads, buildings (painted on the rug), train tracks and even a river with boats. It has kept my 8 year old busy every single day since Santa brought it. I do have one complaint/warning: Amazon ships the rug in a clear plastic bag and of course my son saw it leaning against the front door before Christmas. I was very disappointed because it wasn't a surprise on Christmas morning :(
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great CAR-pet!
customer_reviews.text: This carpet is soft and durable. The printing is clear. And like the other commenters stated, it came out of the box ready to lay flay with no annoying carpet odors. Great for playing cars with enough room to play comfortably with a friend. Interestingly, it is made in Belgium, which gives me confidence that safety standards have been adhered to, vs. products coming out of China.
customer_reviews.author: DE-Jess

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: THis is nice and big but the pictures on the rug are just okay and it kind of smelled a bit I put febreeze on it and it’s good now, but I have it on my patio outside and my 3 year old loves it for playing trains and cars on
customer_reviews.author: DiannC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rug! Good size
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rug! Good size. I tried so hard to find a big rug for my kids for Christmas. Everything else was small and over priced. My 3 and 5 year old use this rug every day. They like to bunch it up so they have mountains to drive on too. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Item had to be returned, too large for play space.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Fiedler

customer_reviews.title: Great rug for imaginative play!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this road rug for my son as a Christmas present. It's been hours of fun for him today already! Great quality rug with many nice town buildings and roads for a toddler or young child to have imaginative play. The rug is larger than I was expecting (I didn't pay attention to the measurements in the listing), but it fits nicely in our play area. The larger size just means that everyone gets to move around a bit more when playing and the whole family can be a part of the action.
customer_reviews.author: Pam R.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best one yet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this carpet for my 2 1/2 year old grandson. He loves it. This is the best one yet. It is a very good size. All the other ones I found in the store were very small. Great deal for the price. I truely give this one thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: louisa

customer_reviews.title: I love this !!
customer_reviews.text: This carpet is great fun for both my one year old grandson to my 10 year old granson. We love the texture and i love the durability. We glide cars,firetrucks and all vehicles over the road ways. Hours of playing on this fun carpet. This was and continues to be a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Tietsort

customer_reviews.title: A great size, brightens their room & fun for driving on!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this one for multiple kids playing at the same time, you won't have to deal with them fighting over space. It brightens the room and has held up well over the last year. I wouldn't say they play with the rug every day - but they do enjoy driving their cars and trains on it. I don't regret buying it --- I got this over getting a car/train table. Since space is an issue for us, this was the more functional, space-saving option.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel & Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Play carpet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for Christmas. I compared this rug with what I found in stores and found this to be much nicer and at a more reasonable price. It is much larger than some of the others I saw and has more areas in the city for him drive his toys to. I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lean

customer_reviews.title: Good carpet and great for kids, but kind of thin
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoys this carpet and plays on it almost everyday. The city icons are easy to see and the play area is large enough that it keeps my son entertained. The only complaint I have is that the carpet is rather thin and I am somewhat concerned about how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon Goede

customer_reviews.title: Dull and disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The pictures look so bright and vibrant online, but when we received it it was rather dull and disappointing. It looks very different than the photos that are advertised. We plan on giving this away because it just isn't what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. It was his Christmas gift and he has been enjoying playing on it since then. The mat is thick enough and does not slide when kept on carpet (we have a carpet flooring). The only difference that I found in the actual play mat is that on the website it shows a more of a square mat but in actual it is rectangular.
customer_reviews.author: A&S

customer_reviews.title: I especially liked this rug because there was no harsh chemical smell ...
customer_reviews.text: My son who was 1.5 yrs old when he got it loves it one year later. He plays with it everyday. I especially liked this rug because there was no harsh chemical smell out of the box and it has not deteriorated with a rough toddler. Highly recommend spending the extra money for this rug.
customer_reviews.author: From Texas

customer_reviews.title: All the kids love this! It really is stain resistant
customer_reviews.text: All the kids love this! It really is stain resistant! Had several spills on it just scrubbed with soap and water, looks like it never happened. The kids love driving their cars and trains on the roads. Was previously going to buy an actual track but after reading some of the reviews I decided to get this instead and it is perfect! Will probably be buying a 2nd one so it'd be 6 feet wide instead of 3 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Special needs mom

customer_reviews.title: Dad-Approved Play Carpet For Three Kids!
customer_reviews.text: Carpet is very high quality and pretty detailed for a kids playmat! It stays put pretty darn well on tile. There is no smell. My three kids love playing on it for hours with their cars. My kids love to use their imagination to pretend on this mat... no darn electronic tablet can do this! I've vacuumed it and washed up a couple spills. No issues whatsoever! Would I buy it again, YES!
customer_reviews.author: Over-researching  Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Kids (2.5yr & 9mon) love this! Entertaining for hrs! quality is great, easy to clean, great traction underneath
customer_reviews.author: Tara N.

customer_reviews.title: would have been nice to not have half a building here
customer_reviews.text: its basically a big carpet with the same small print / pattern over and over. would have been nice to not have half a building here, the same building every few inches, etc. BUT it is huge, so multiple children can play with it, and it was nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: melissa austin

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this carpet for like a year or so now and it's perfect the no slip backing is still working great and it still looks practically new.
customer_reviews.author: Krystina Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect play rug for children!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and my kids love it! Didn't have a problem with packaging and the size is decent. Only complaint is it doesn't look like the advertised picture, only apart of it like the image was shifted. Kids don't notice though so really not a problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Rug
customer_reviews.text: My son is absolutely in love with this rug! The size is perfeft and he loves to pretend to drive through a real city. It was packages rolled up verses folded and unrolled nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Allissa Hilaire

customer_reviews.title: It's an "ok" rug
customer_reviews.text: Pictures look distorted and its obviously cut from a huge roll so the streets just run off the edge instead of letting my son drive all around it...just not the quality I was hoping for...should have went w the Melissa and Doug one.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi P.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! I wasn't expecting it to be quite so big but it is truly wonderful. My only complaint is it bunches up when a child is moving all around it. It is still fairly new so that could be just because it is still settling. If it changes I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C.

customer_reviews.title: ... carpet is very well make and is holding up great in my boys room
customer_reviews.text: This carpet is very well make and is holding up great in my boys room. It is think enough to vacuum and stay in place well while they play.
customer_reviews.author: MamaGord

customer_reviews.title: High quality and it's a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than the little car play carpets sold in stores. I want to get a second to make a big square; the roads will match up just right. Very high quality; the images are sewn in, not printed on. We have had many hours of playing cars on this cool mat.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rug
customer_reviews.text: Great size rug for the price and it is actually "rug like" not plastic like many of the other ones I have found. Only disappointment was that it got a snag on the back from our cat and when my son pulled on it it unravelled the whole line. Still love the rug for the price but wish it wouldn't have torn so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Royce

customer_reviews.title: Must have for kids
customer_reviews.text: Just like when we were kids, my kids will put down their tablets to play on this. Awesome buy
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Van Steenburgh

customer_reviews.title: They both can be pretty rough on things
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my kids last year for Christmas. They both can be pretty rough on things, but it still looks like new! It is durable and quite large. The backing on it is great for all types of floors and doesn't slide around much when down. I love it and most importantly my kids do too! A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad we bought it
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about this. The picture looks kind of cheap. I am so glad we bought it. It has held up to 5 kids doing way more with it then just using it as a train track. It looks as prestige as the day it came... And it has suffered. Lol. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Fleming

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this rug!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son's bed room. He has a train table next to it, but loves "driving" his trains on the streets. When he walks on it, he likes to pretend he's a car and only walks on the street-it's the cutest thing!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina von Kriegenbergh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use carpet to cover our kids play area and thus far this has been a great buy, they enjoy playing on the carpet and use their toys on the area especially cars and such. I would highly recommend, the size is true to fit and covers a large area.
customer_reviews.author: Hav0c2all

customer_reviews.title: I love the non slip rear surface and the edges are ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the non slip rear surface and the edges are fray resistant. These are one of those purchases where spending a bit more will buy you more. My kid is having a blast playing on the surface pretending to drive through town and park. I would like to see additional mats that can be "attached" to this so you can expanding the experience such as farm, airport, etc.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: He even said to me "Mumma the elves did a bad job on this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to be from Santa. I wish I hadn't so I can return it. It is so pixalated that we can't even tell what the buildings are supposed to be! He even said to me "Mumma the elves did a bad job on this!" Luckily my neighbors got him another kind of car mat. He uses that one much more.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Great play mat!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son for Christmas this year. He loves it. It seems to not slip and I like that it has both roads and railroad tracks as he is into both cars, trucks and trains.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good size and value
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for a couple kids at a time and little boy loved it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Once rolled out does take a day ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Once rolled out does take a day or two to settle and become flat. My son loves it. It has train tracks and roads. Boat pics and water. The picture on the mat is not as clear as they make it look online but it is not bad. Overall I would buy this again. Great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Joe Obirek

customer_reviews.title: Learning Carpets City Life Play Carpet
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I gave it to my grandson a couple days before Christmas, my daughter had to "make" him come open gifts from Santa Christmas morning he liked it so much, I had given him some Hot Wheels to go along with it!
customer_reviews.author: WBH

customer_reviews.title: Made a little boy very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for a Christmas Charity. I picked out the little boy I wanted to sponsor and bought him the gifts he wanted from his wish list. There are many that are listed on Amazon and I had a hard time choosing. I wanted him to have something that would really last throughout his childhood. I did very well with this purchase as the item was large, thick and a very high quality purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Crawford

customer_reviews.title: 2nd times a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought the train rug, and like a few others have posted, the design was not correctly printed. However, I got a replacement and thankfully this one was correct. They did say they will make sure it doesn't happen again, but who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Front looks good, but the back is aging
customer_reviews.text: I bought it when there was a flash sale in Amazon a few days ago. When I received the item, I found the print is very good, however the back is quite disappointing. The latex gel near the edge is peeling off, and the back is full of dark hard dots. It looks like the storage for this product was not proper or it was made very long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Two purpose addition to the kid's playroom
customer_reviews.text: We gave this item to my grandson for Easter as a gift and he just cannot get enough of play time on it- He spends hours running his little cars, trucks and planes over it- It has taken the place of watching so much television which builds no creativity in a child. Plus it looks kinda cool on the floor as a scatter rug- A great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for our 5 year old who is obsessed with cars, trucks, trains, 'diggers', monster trucks...if it has wheels and an engine he loves it. He had gotten a much smaller rug of a different brand for his 2nd birthday and didn't play on it much. The detail and scale of this rug is great. When it comes to 'work' play he likes to keep things pretty realistic and this rug fits the bill. He will sit and play on it for hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Kasandra B

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My two and a half year old son loves this! Every time he comes over to my house he asks if I can lay the carpet out for him! He loves to play with his Matchbox cars on it
customer_reviews.author: Matt Spano

customer_reviews.title: This is s nice size rug that is quite durable
customer_reviews.text: This is s nice size rug that is quite durable. I use it in ABA therapy with my 4 year old son. There is lots of opportunity to ask questions and gives us an opportunity play with lots of race cars, tractors and trains. When we are done playing we just role it up and place it in the closet. We absolutely love this rug.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great colors. Something I didn't pick up on when ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, it IS a carpet. Durable. Well built. Great colors. Something I didn't pick up on when I was ordering it is the roads go off the edge like you can add another one to it maybe. Great product. Worst thing I can say is it looks much bigger in the picture. Thankfully I got a tape measure out and used their dimensions to get an accurate idea of the actual size.
customer_reviews.author: numbaone

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes this carpet. It has a place for cards, trains, and boats. The colors are bright. We've had it for over a year now, and it is still in great condition. The color has not shaded at all and it sits on the floor all the time. It does slide a little bit on the carpet, but in my opinion it's minimal. This carpet is a little more expensive than most others, but in my option it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JVS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for little kids that love cars and trains
customer_reviews.text: My son loves playing with his cars on the ground. This is absolutely perfect. The roads exactly fit a matchbox car on each lane of the roads, so you know the scale. It's a lot bigger than i assumed it would be (even though it tells you the size, i think) is 6 foot x a little over 3 foot. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves it..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this area rug for my then 4 year old nephew. OMG, he was trilled. He love cars, has a million of them and now he also loves playing on this carpet. Not only that, he takes his carpet everywhere he goes, lol. Need to get him another one for travel. Too cute.. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nelly

customer_reviews.title: Our grandson plays for hours with this. I never ...
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson plays for hours with this. I never knew vehicles, when driven on a play mat, could make so many different noises.
customer_reviews.author: jlm

customer_reviews.title: It nice size for all 3 of my toddlers to play ...
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than i thought. I was thinking of traveling with it with a few cars but its kind of too big for that but thats why it got five star. It nice size for all 3 of my toddlers to play with. The price is nice too. When they are playing with it, it keeps them busy.
customer_reviews.author: James R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for four boys.
customer_reviews.text: This little rug is great: it is incredibly sturdy, and big enough all four boys can play with their "beep-beeps" (cars) at once and not be tripping over each other. Even the cat hasn't managed to destroy it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Peachy

product_meta.title: Learning Carpets Ridethe TrainPlay Carpet, 79” by 36” –Themed Carpet Develops Imagination –Skid-Proof Gel Backing –Durable -Self-Contained Play Mat for Hours of Fun –Indoor/Outdoor Use
product_meta.description:
Style:Ride The TrainAll aboard the Learning Carpets Ridethe Train Play Carpet! Be the engineer of your own line and set your sights on fun! When you ride the rails over highways, byways and waterways, creativity is endless. Perfect for school, home, day care and more, get out the toy trainsand your children’s imaginations can take control. Imaginative play can transport kids of all ages into exciting new worlds and adventures. Extremely versatile, kids can play on the 79” by 36” colorful play carpet indoors or outside. Hours of fun can be had without ever leaving the border of this train-themed play carpet. This carpet is a great monetary and educational value and makes a great screen-free gift!The Ridethe Trainplay carpet features a durable latex gel skid-proof backing. In addition, the 3-ply felt backing increases sound and thermal insulation and prevents wrinkling and creasing. Learning Carpets are 100% polyamide and able to Commented [JM7]: Updated this to match the other client edits for this listing withstand rugged wear and tear. They are surface washable, made of the highest quality materials, meet all safety requirements and come with a 2-year warranty

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Ride The Train , LC142, carpet, rug, learning carpets, train, engineer, rails, railroad. Durable Latex Gel Skid-Proof Backing. 100% Polypropylene.
feature_bullets: ALL ABOARD: Be the engineer of your own line and set your sights on fun! When you ride the rails over highways, byways and waterways, creativity is endless. This colorful carpet is great for school, home, day care and more.

INDOOR OR OUTDOOR USE: Kids can play on the 79” by 36” play carpet indoors or outside. Hours of fun can be had without ever leaving the border of this train-themed play carpet. This carpet is a great monetary and educational value!

DEVELOPS IMAGINATION: Get out the toy trainsand your children’s imaginations can take control. Imaginative play can transport kids of all ages into exciting new worlds and adventures. Makes a great gift!
DURABLE: Learning Carpets are100% polyamide and able to withstand rugged wear and tear. They are surface washable, made of the highest quality materials and meet all safety requirements.

NON-SKID BACKING: The Ride the Trainplay carpet features a durable latex gel skid-proof backing. In addition, the 3-ply felt backing increases sound and thermal insulation and prevents wrinkling and creasing.
Received several highly regarded educational toys & gifts awards
Ideal gifts for holidays, baby showers, birthdays

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
